flawed_nl_solution:
He made $600 mowing yards, $250 for his birthday, $150 selling items and $150 doing odd jobs so he made 600+250+150+150 = $<<600+250+150+150=1150>>1150
He made $1150 and will save 40% so he saves 1150*0.4 = $<<1150*0.4=406>>406
#### 406

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 460, not 406. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
